mapper.select: select a.id , a.article_title as articleTitle, a.article_cover as articleCover, a.article_time as articleTime, u.user_name as userName from article a left join user u on a.user_id = u.user_id;
select a.*, u.user_name as userName from article a left join user u on a.user_id = u.user_id where a.id = #{articleId};
